actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to provide that the U.S. Postal Service shall be subject to certain provisions of the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970.

summary.text: Provides that the United States Postal Service shall be subject to certain provisions of the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to provide that the U.S. Postal Service shall be subject to certain provisions of the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970.
